author: physicist87
body:
back port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15671

The name of MET trigger path was changed into PFMETHBHECleaned for HLTJetMET Trigger validation.

In the previous version, the trigger path having "_NoiseCleaned" can be selected for HLTJetMET Trigger Validation.

However the trigger path having "_NoiseCleaned" was removed.

We need to changed the name of trigger path.
title: Fixed No MET Trigger Information in HLTJETMET validation (for80X)
